report_review_findings.description: Grand Total calculation is incorrect. The sum of the Total Cost column is not equal to the value in E10.
Quantity value is missing for the 'Client Lunch' item.
Department name 'Financee' is misspelled. It should be 'Finance'.
Date format in F4 (15-Oct-2023) differs from other date entries (mm/dd/yyyy).
Expense date in F8 (11/05/2024) is in the future.

unscheduled_requests.reason: Conflict with Project Phoenix - Kick-off for Conference Room A
